Issue.creator: nnao
Issue.summary: Not correct variable for debug messages in gossip
Issue.description: DEBU 19b9 rpc error: code = Canceled desc = context canceled Got error, aborting: %!v(MISSING) {code} the source code of this message is as follow. at gossip/comm/conn.go L352 {code} errChan <- err conn.logger.Debugf("Got error, aborting: %v", err) return {code} A channel of "errChan" receives a value from "err" and a value of "err" becomes empty. Maybe "err" should be replaced with "errChan". >
